broadwick.montecarlo.markovchain

Interface MarkovStepGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MarkovChain

    public interface MarkovStepGenerator
    A Path consists of several steps generated at random.

    • Method Summary

      MonteCarloStep generateNextStep(MonteCarloStep step)
      Generate the next step in the path.
